docs.text: dans-nexus-maven-plugin ¶ Maven plugin to deploy RPMs to a Nexus Repository SYNOPSIS ¶ <plugin> <groupId>nl.knaw.dans</groupId> <artifactId>dans-nexus-maven-plugin</artifactId> <version>plugin-version</version> <configuration> <nexusUserName>nexus_user</nexusUserName> <nexusPassword>nexus_password</nexusPassword> <rpmRepositoryUrl>http://your.nexus.host/repository/rpm-releases</rpmRepositoryUrl> <snapshotRpmRepositoryUrl>http://your.nexus.host/repository/rpm-snapshots </snapshotRpmRepositoryUrl> </configuration> </plugin> mvn deploy # OR mvn dans-nexus:deploy-rpm DESCRIPTION ¶ The Nexus Repository Manager support several types of repositories, among which is YUM. However, there seems to be no support for publishing your RPM artifacts with the standard maven-deploy-plugin . dans-nexus-maven-plugin tries to fill that gap. Usage ¶
docs.title: Manual
